column4: Guys, how can I get my internet connection to show up on networks so that I can browse the internet;'
I have it all set up already...I'm using it now to chat with you and I am updating I just can't browse is all
you may need to define name servers in /etc/resolv.conf
and what should I use for nameserver ?  IP address or something ?
when you have added the lines, run: sudo /etc/init.d/networking restart
you will now have DNS servers
I followed each of those steps but it didn't solve the problem
Do you have any other ideas about what I can do ?
do you still have that lp link that you gave me a few days ago?  I have no sound at startup
thank you.  FYI, my alsa-utils was in /sbin and the line to comment out was #377
cool, as long as you comment the line its fine ;)
